statements.select:
DECLARE @RecordCount INT SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(T1.Wal_ID) FROM EWM_Wallet T1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T21.AFC_ID 'CustomerID' , CASE T21.AFC_IsPlatform WHEN 1 THEN '平台内汽修商' WHEN 0 THEN '一般汽修商户' END 'CustomerType' , T21.AFC_Name 'CustomerName' , T21.AFC_PhoneNo 'CustomerPhoneNo' , CASE T21.AFC_IsPlatform WHEN 1 THEN T21.AFC_Name WHEN 0 THEN NULL END 'AutoFactoryName' FROM PIS_AutoFactoryCustomer T21 WHERE T21.AFC_IsValid = 1 UNION SELECT T22.GC_ID 'CustomerID' , '普通客户' 'CustomerType' , T22.GC_Name 'CustomerName' , T22.GC_PhoneNo 'CustomerPhoneNo' , NULL 'AutoFactoryName' FROM PIS_GeneralCustomer T22 WHERE T22.GC_IsValid = 1 ) T2 ON T2.CustomerID = T1.Wal_CustomerID AND T2.CustomerType = T1.Wal_OwnerTypeName WHERE T1.Wal_IsValid = 1
T1.Wal_Org_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_Wal_Org_ID#+'%'
T1.Wal_No LIKE '%'+#WHERE_Wal_No#+'%'
T1.Wal_OwnerTypeName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_Wal_OwnerTypeName#+'%'
T1.Wal_CustomerName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_Wal_CustomerName#+'%'
T1.Wal_RecommendEmployee LIKE '%'+#WHERE_Wal_RecommendEmployee#+'%'
T1.Wal_CreatedTime BETWEEN #_CreatedTimeStart# AND #_CreatedTimeEnd# T1.Wal_CreatedTime >= #_CreatedTimeStart#
T1.Wal_CreatedTime <= #_CreatedTimeEnd#
T2.CustomerPhoneNo LIKE '%'+#WHERE_CustomerPhoneNo#+'%'
T2.AutoFactoryName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_AutoFactoryName#+'%'
SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount' , T1.Wal_ID , T1.Wal_Org_ID , T1.Wal_Org_Name , T1.Wal_No , T1.Wal_SourceTypeCode , T1.Wal_SourceTypeName , T1.Wal_SourceNo , T1.Wal_OwnerTypeCode , T1.Wal_OwnerTypeName , T1.Wal_CustomerID , T1.Wal_CustomerName , T1.Wal_AutoFactoryCode , T1.Wal_AutoFactoryOrgCode , T1.Wal_TradingPassword , T1.Wal_AvailableBalance , T1.Wal_FreezingBalance , T1.Wal_DepositBaseAmount , T1.Wal_RecommendEmployeeID , T1.Wal_RecommendEmployee , T1.Wal_CreatedByOrgID , T1.Wal_CreatedByOrgName , T1.Wal_EffectiveTime , T1.Wal_IneffectiveTime , T1.Wal_StatusCode , T1.Wal_StatusName , T1.Wal_Remark , T1.Wal_IsValid , T1.Wal_CreatedBy , T1.Wal_CreatedTime , T1.Wal_UpdatedBy , T1.Wal_UpdatedTime , T1.Wal_VersionNo , T2.CustomerPhoneNo , T2.AutoFactoryName FROM EWM_Wallet T1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T21.AFC_ID 'CustomerID' , CASE T21.AFC_IsPlatform WHEN 1 THEN '平台内汽修商' WHEN 0 THEN '一般汽修商户' END 'CustomerType' , T21.AFC_Name 'CustomerName' , T21.AFC_PhoneNo 'CustomerPhoneNo' , CASE T21.AFC_IsPlatform WHEN 1 THEN T21.AFC_Name WHEN 0 THEN NULL END 'AutoFactoryName' FROM PIS_AutoFactoryCustomer T21 WHERE T21.AFC_IsValid = 1 UNION SELECT T22.GC_ID 'CustomerID' , '普通客户' 'CustomerType' , T22.GC_Name 'CustomerName' , T22.GC_PhoneNo 'CustomerPhoneNo' , NULL 'AutoFactoryName' FROM PIS_GeneralCustomer T22 WHERE T22.GC_IsValid = 1 ) T2 ON T2.CustomerID = T1.Wal_CustomerID AND T2.CustomerType = T1.Wal_OwnerTypeName WHERE T1.Wal_IsValid = 1
T1.Wal_Org_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_Wal_Org_ID#+'%'
T1.Wal_No LIKE '%'+#WHERE_Wal_No#+'%'
T1.Wal_OwnerTypeName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_Wal_OwnerTypeName#+'%'
T1.Wal_CustomerName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_Wal_CustomerName#+'%'
T1.Wal_RecommendEmployee LIKE '%'+#WHERE_Wal_RecommendEmployee#+'%'
T1.Wal_CreatedTime BETWEEN #_CreatedTimeStart# AND #_CreatedTimeEnd# T1.Wal_CreatedTime >= #_CreatedTimeStart#
T1.Wal_CreatedTime <= #_CreatedTimeEnd#
T2.CustomerPhoneNo LIKE '%'+#WHERE_CustomerPhoneNo#+'%'
T2.AutoFactoryName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_AutoFactoryName#+'%'
ORDER BY T1.Wal_UpdatedTime DESC
OFFSET ( #PageIndex# - 1 ) * #PageSize# ROWS FETCH NEXT #PageSize# ROWS ONLY
statements.update: UPDATE EWM_Wallet SET Wal_RecommendEmployee = #Wal_RecommendEmployee# , Wal_RecommendEmployeeID = #Wal_RecommendEmployeeID# , Wal_Remark = #Wal_Remark# , Wal_VersionNo = Wal_VersionNo + 1 , Wal_UpdatedBy = #Wal_UpdatedBy# , Wal_UpdatedTime = GETDATE() WHERE Wal_ID = #WHERE_Wal_ID# AND Wal_VersionNo = #WHERE_Wal_VersionNo#
